replies.body:
Hey guys, NA is currently having an issue with patching and resulting in the 003 for many players.  This is a server issue beyond what the connection guide can offer.  I'll be creating a new pinned thread for updates on this specific case, and our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page has been updated.  Hang tight!

New pinned thread has been created in[ this link](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/TnsAe3dU-november-21-2017-error-003-server-issues)!

i have the same error too (003 error) but i did reinstalled the game. then i cant open LoL anymore ( whenever i click on the icon it pop up on the screen then disappear). so is it because of the 003 error or something else?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mRV6rENp,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-11-21T19:49:20.577+0000)
>
> Hey guys, NA is currently having an issue with patching and resulting in the 003 for many players.  This is a server issue beyond what the connection guide can offer.  I'll be creating a new pinned thread for updates on this specific case, and our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page has been updated.  Hang tight!
> 
> New pinned thread has been created in[ this link](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/TnsAe3dU-november-21-2017-error-003-server-issues)!

Thanks, I was wondering if something was broken on my end.

How about Error Code 3? I get a message saying the game is trying to patch but something is wrong with the servers. I press the restart button, and it opens a patching window with a 0 MB update. Suggestions?
I just got the same thing, but i updated earlier today and played a couple of games so i have no idea what is going on.
Same here. Error 003. Patching/download window hangs at 0.0 MB / 0.0 MB ETA 0 MINS.

> [{quoted}](name=ThaFrEaKNL,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mRV6rENp,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-21T19:34:57.019+0000)
>
> Same here. Error 003. Patching/download window hangs at 0.0 MB / 0.0 MB ETA 0 MINS.

Yep, and it finished downloading and installing the patch before this issue came up.
same here dont know what the fuck! is going on

Looks like we're having server issues at the moment causing this for a lot of players.  Our network team is looking into it now to resolve it as soon as they can.  I've made a[ pinned thread ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/TnsAe3dU-november-21-2017-error-003-server-issues)in the meantime for updates.
Also got the Error Code 003, and the Troubleshooting Guide linked in the FAQ above isn't helping. (Note I'm from EUW.)

Ever since the new update, I've been getting a bunch of jitter spikes and my fps can't stay at 60 (I keep my fps capped ar 60 since that is what my monitor supports.) I can uncap it and my frames would stay around 100-160 but I get a bunch of screen tearing since again, my monitor only supports 60 fps. My problem is, capping my fps at 60 gives me a bunch of lag spikes every 10-15 seconds, and I am not sure what I can do to fix it.
I have a really old monitor, I honestly don't even know what it is, and I have a nvidia gt 720, I am upgrading both of these soon, would this fix my issue? Thanks for the help.

Just wanted to second this. I'm playing on a Mac (don't know if that matters), but since the patch, I have been getting a lot of "jitter", esp. on ARAM when the game starts, and throughout the game on Twisted Treeline. I also keep my fps capped at 60 and its been less stable.

In addition, my normally extremely stable ping (~43ms) has been all over the place, spiking every minute or so. Making games much harder to play...

Thanks!

Hope any of this helps!
Having problems error code 003

Must be a temporary thing, the FAQ page sends you to connection issues, so I am assuming Riot is having issues on their end that isn't allowing us to connect to the patching servers.

Edit: notice is up about patching issues.
Me too
I've been getting the failing to create dump file error and I can't seem to find a fix for it so i was looking to see if anyone has had the error multiple times and found a fix
So did you totally forget game crash  happened on macOS?

I never had a problem with network, now when i try to connect in the game it appear a network warning, what i should do?
Can you help me?

fps problem. from 120 fps to 60-80 and when the game starts 40 from 230.
all started when i installed patch 7.23.

Attempting to reconnect comes up when I start any game eventhough the ping is good
1. Anyone having the same problem?

Hi, after patch 7.23 yesterday i haven't been able to connect to my games very reliably. Everything is fine until we load in to the game, then it just says reconnecting for the first 4 minutes or so. however, this time i was completely unable to connect. i have only had this problem after patch 7.23, i tried repairing the game which didn't help, and i only have these connection issues on league of legends. other games work just fine, no connection issues at all.

Ever since downloading the new patch, I haven't been able to play any games. I've been able to log in, open the client, get through champion select... but whenever the game itself tries to launch, I just get a white screen and am forced to disconnect. 

Does anyone know how to resolve it?
attempting to reconnect since new patch help please.
my client don't open it just shows league of legend in the middle of the screen for 5 secs and then closes
I patched and i go into the game but I never go into loading screen, right after the q ticks to 0, it says reconnect and i dont enter the game even if i reset the game and reinstall. Plz help lol
I need to patch 6000mb for some reason... Can anyone help???{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

Hi, I am r1a2n3d4o5m name
*Sorry for bad grammar

I played a game about 30 minutes ago with Rammus {{champion:33}} in a ranked game and achieve S (Finally) with it but I didn't receive my level 7 token and it won't show my tier when I go to match history in league of legend client nor league of legend official website (just blank).

I am very stress about this, please help me solve this problem as soon as possible.

Thank You!

Patching went past a 100 percent than started counting into negative.   So i restart the launcher now its saying 2000 mb to download and the speed of my conneciton is perfect with 80 ping.  On top of it all its not even downloading its saying 1934.7 mb left than changes to 1934.8 mb left than back again than back again.
I just reinstalled the game, and I regret about that. Takes too long to update
Thank god it's not just me, I thought I was going to have to reinstall or something. Definitely on Riots end, guess we will just have to wait it out.
003 error. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
